sentence.Network_en: On April 19 sorrowing Japanese were cremating Admiral Yamamoto.
sentence.Network_cn: 4月19日,哀伤的日本人把山本海军大将送进火海中去.

sentence.Network_en: Behold, Thy father and I have sought Thee sorrowing.
sentence.Network_cn: 看哪, 你父亲和我伤心来找你.

sentence.Network_en: But the Communion service was not to be a season of sorrowing.
sentence.Network_cn: 但圣餐不该成为悲哀的礼节,因为这原不是它的宗旨.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... despair.虽然免费，从卑微的和不受控制的情感，上帝是caringly与穷人，不幸的，孤独的，sorrowing ，患病者，受害者的偏见，不公平，焦虑和绝望。
he promises to relieve the burdened mind , to comfort the sorrowing , and to give hope to the despondent .他应许解除人精神上的负担，安慰忧伤的人，使灰心的人有希望。
